trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 HTTP 內建物件，此物件提供來自 ASP.NET 作業的 HTTP 回應資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase>類別，並做為包裝函式<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class while also exposing the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開的功能<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別也公開時<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase>型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase>類別可讓您取代的原始實作<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。

trans-unit.source: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.
trans-unit.target: 由這個包裝函式提供存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="httpResponse" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="httpResponse" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A file, cache key, or <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> object to add to the list of application dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 要加入應用程式相依性清單的檔案、快取索引鍵或 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, associates cache dependencies with the response that enable the response to be invalidated if it is cached and if the specified dependencies change.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將快取相依性與在快取和指定的相依性變更時，讓回應失效的回應相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on other items in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the keys of the items that the cached response is dependent on.
trans-unit.target: 包含快取回應所相依之項目索引鍵的集合。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on the specified items in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的指定項目。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the keys of the items that the cached response is dependent on.
trans-unit.target: 包含快取回應所相依之項目索引鍵的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached item dependent on the specified items in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取項目的有效性取決於快取中的指定項目。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item that the cached response is dependent on.
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引鍵，為快取回應所依存。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on the specified item in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的指定項目。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on a specified file or files.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The names of the files to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds file names to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱加入至目前回應所相依之檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of files names to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of file names to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱陣列加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single file name to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將單一檔案名稱加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add <c>value</c> to.
trans-unit.target: 要新增 <c>value</c> 之 HTTP 標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the header.
trans-unit.target: 要加入標頭的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the current response.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP 標頭加入至目前回應。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個方法的目的，是為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容。

trans-unit.source: The callback method.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Registers a callback that the ASP.NET runtime will invoke immediately before response headers are sent for this request.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ASP.NET 執行階段會立即在回應標頭傳送給這個要求之前叫用的回呼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.ISubscriptionToken" /> object that represents the subscription to the OnSendingHeaders pseudo event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.ISubscriptionToken" /> 物件，代表 OnSendingHeaders 虛擬事件的訂閱。

trans-unit.source: The cookie to add to the response.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至回應的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP cookie to the HTTP response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP Cookie 加入至 HTTP 回應 Cookie 集合中。

trans-unit.source: The cookie was added after the HTTP headers were sent.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 會在送出 HTTP 標頭之後加入。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add to the current response.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至目前回應的 HTTP 標頭名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the header.
trans-unit.target: 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the current response.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP 標頭加入至目前回應。

trans-unit.source: The header was appended after the HTTP headers were sent.
trans-unit.target: 在送出 HTTP 標頭之後附加標頭。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 要加入記錄檔的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds custom log information to the Internet Information Services (IIS) log file.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂記錄資訊加入網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of a resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Adds a session ID to the virtual path if the session is using <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless" /> session state, and returns the combined path.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作階段使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless" /> 工作階段狀態，並傳回合併的路徑，則將工作階段 ID 加入虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path with the session ID inserted.
trans-unit.target: 包含插入之工作階段 ID 的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless" /> session state is not used, returns the original <paramref name="virtualpath" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection.Cookieless" /> 工作階段狀態，則會傳回原始 <paramref name="virtualpath" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The callback object.
trans-unit.target: 回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: The response state.
trans-unit.target: 回應狀態。

trans-unit.source: Sends the currently buffered response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 將目前已緩衝的回應傳送到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result object.
trans-unit.target: 非同步結果物件。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object supports asynchronous flush operations and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or from an asynchronous handler, the flush operation is performed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>物件支援非同步清除作業，從非同步模組事件或非同步處理常式會呼叫這個方法會以非同步方式執行清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the flush operation is performed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會以同步方式執行排清作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is supported for IIS 6.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: IIS 6.0 和更新版本支援非同步清除。

trans-unit.source: The response is already completed.
trans-unit.target: 已經完成回應。

trans-unit.source: The binary characters to write to the current response.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入目前回應中的二進位字元。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string of binary characters to the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將二進位字元的字串寫入 HTTP 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer output and send it after the complete response has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要緩衝輸出並在整個回應處理完成之後將它送出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the output is buffered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要緩衝輸出，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" /> 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.Buffer%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper> class has been deprecated in favor of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.BufferOutput%2A> property and is provided only for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.Buffer%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper>類別已被取代之喜好<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.BufferOutput%2A>屬性並提供是為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer output and send it after the complete page has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要緩衝輸出並在整個頁面處理完成之後將它送出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the output is buffered; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要緩衝輸出，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caching policy (such as expiration time, privacy settings, and vary clauses) of the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前頁面的快取原則 (例如，到期時間、隱私權設定與 Vary 子句)。

trans-unit.source: The caching policy of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 目前回應的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP header that matches one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定符合其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> 列舉值的 <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The caching policy of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 目前回應的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP character set of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前回應的 HTTP 字元集 (Character Set)。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP character set of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 目前回應的 HTTP 字元集。

trans-unit.source: Clears all headers and content output from the current response.
trans-unit.target: 從目前回應清除所有標頭和內容輸出。

trans-unit.source: Clears all content output from the current response.
trans-unit.target: 從目前回應清除所有內容輸出。

trans-unit.source: Clears all headers from the current response.
trans-unit.target: 從目前回應清除所有標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> object that is tripped when the client disconnects.
trans-unit.target: 取得用戶端中斷連接時發生錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token that is tripped when the client disconnects.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端中斷連接時觸動的取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClientDisconnectedToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ClientDisconnectedToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Closes the socket connection to a client.
trans-unit.target: 關閉與用戶端的通訊端連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content encoding of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前回應的內容編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The information about the content encoding of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 目前回應的內容編碼方式相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP MIME type of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前回應的 HTTP MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP MIME type of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 目前回應的 HTTP MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "<see langword="text/html" />".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "<see langword="text/html" />"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType" /> property is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應 Cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 回應 Cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: Disables kernel caching for the current response.
trans-unit.target: 停用目前回應的核心快取處理。

trans-unit.source: Disables IIS user-mode caching for this response.
trans-unit.target: 停用這個回應的 IIS 使用者模式快取。

trans-unit.source: For information about this member, see <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.DisableUserCache%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.DisableUserCache%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client, stops execution of the requested process, and raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 將目前所有緩衝的輸出傳送到用戶端、停止執行所要求的處理序，並引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The call to <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.End" /> has terminated the current request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.End" /> 呼叫已終止目前要求。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result object.
trans-unit.target: 非同步結果物件。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 不支援非同步排清，而且 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter cannot be cast to a <see langword="FlushAsyncResult" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 不支援非同步排清，而且 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數無法轉換成 <see langword="FlushAsyncResult" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of minutes before a page that is cached on the client or proxy expires.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用戶端或 Proxy 上快取頁面到期以前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: If the user returns to the same page before it expires, the cached version is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在頁面到期前返回相同的頁面，則會顯示快取版本。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.Expires" /> is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.Expires" /> 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes before the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面到期前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the absolute date and time at which cached information expires in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定快取資訊在快取中到期的絕對日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.ExpiresAbsolute" /> is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.ExpiresAbsolute" /> 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 頁面到期的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a filter object that is used to modify the HTTP entity body before transmission.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在傳輸之前修改 HTTP 實體主體的篩選物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that acts as the output filter.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸出篩選條件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 送出所有目前正在緩衝的輸出到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the response was finished.
trans-unit.target: 已在完成回應之後呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式將目前所緩衝的所輸出輸送到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 物件，代表非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding for the header of the current response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前回應之標頭的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The information about the encoding for the current header.
trans-unit.target: 目前標頭的編碼方式相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The encoding value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The encoding value is <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode" />.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的值是 <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The headers have already been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已傳送標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of response headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: The response headers.
trans-unit.target: 回應標頭。

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此作業需要在 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 的整合管線模式中，且至少為 .NET Framework 3.0 版。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the response headers have been written.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出是否已寫入回應標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the response headers have been written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已寫入回應標頭則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client is connected to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示用戶端是否與伺服器連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client is currently connected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前已連接到用戶端，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client is being redirected to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否要將用戶端重新導向至新位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the location response header differs from the current location; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位置回應標頭中的值不同於目前的位置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that enables output of text to the outgoing HTTP response stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得讓文字輸出至連出 HTTP 回應資料流的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables custom output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 可讓自訂輸出至用戶端的物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides binary output to the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: 提供二進位輸出至外送 HTTP 內容主體。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the raw contents of the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示外送 HTTP 內容主體的未經處理內容。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the <see langword="PICS-Label" /> header.
trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see langword="PICS-Label" /> 標頭的字串。

trans-unit.source: Appends an HTTP <see langword="PICS-Label" /> header to the current response.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP <see langword="PICS-Label" /> 標頭附加至目前的回應。

trans-unit.source: Promotes the promised object.
trans-unit.target: 提升承諾的物件。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推播要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 其應為伺服器想要推送到用戶端之相對資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 可支援傳送推播確認給 HTTP 2.0 用戶端的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).

trans-unit.source: PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it.
trans-unit.target: PushPromise 不具決定性，而且應用程式不應該擁有邏輯取決於它。

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 其唯一目的是在某些情況下的效能優勢。

trans-unit.source: There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely.
trans-unit.target: 有可能會導致完全忽略推播要求的許多情況 （通訊協定和實作）。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 其應為伺服器想要推送到用戶端之相對資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: A 301 HTTP status code is a standard code in an HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 301 的 HTTP 狀態碼是標準的程式碼，在 HTTP 回應中。

trans-unit.source: It indicates that a permanent redirect exists, and it provides the redirect location.
trans-unit.target: 代表永久重新導向存在，且它可提供重新導向位置。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%29> method terminates the rest of the response.

trans-unit.target: 使用對應至新 URL 的路由名稱及路由參數值，執行永遠從要求的 URL 重新導向至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被提供給方便撰寫程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.RedirectPermanent%2A> method with the second parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.RedirectPermanent%2A>第二個參數設定為具有方法`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the object that is passed in `routeValues` to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType> object by using the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將傳入的物件`routeValues`至<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件使用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is then called to determine the URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>然後呼叫方法來決定 URL。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 301 HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會藉由傳回 301 的 HTTP 狀態碼來執行重新導向。

trans-unit.target: 沒有路由對應到指定的路由參數。

trans-unit.source: Redirection was attempted after the HTTP headers had been sent.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 標頭送出之後嘗試重新導向。

trans-unit.target: 路徑的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The route parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 路由參數值。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路由名稱及路由參數值，執行永遠從要求的 URL 重新導向至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來決定的 URL。
